topic: 9. Which of the following are objectives for formal technical reviews?
options: allow senior staff members to correct errors
determining who introduced an error into a program
uncover errors in software work products
topic_cn: 9. 下列哪些是正式技术评审的目标？
options_cn: 允许高级员工纠正错误
确定是谁在程序中引入了错误
发现软件工作产品中的错误
